def initialize(name, namespace = '')
  super(name.to_s)
  @namespace = namespace
end

    # File lib/did_you_mean/spell_checkers/name_error_checkers/class_name_checker.rb, line 42
def full_name
  self.class.new("#{namespace}#{self}")
end
